title: Imitations of Horace - suggest Radcliff's doctors

content.question: Lines 23â€“24 suggest that Radcliff's doctors

choices.label: are as much concerned with social accomplishments as with medical training
prefer French medical education to English

content.answer: are as much concerned with social accomplishments as with medical training

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
